title: RGB Adventure
synopsis: The light – it is the resource of life. There are mysterious monsters and robots that aim at the powers of the light, i.e. R(Red), G(Green), and B(Blue). However, no one notices that… except three children.
staff: [['Iida, Satoki', ['Sound Director']], ['Kinoshita, Yuuki', ['Storyboard', ' Animation Director']], ['Imaruoka, Atsushi', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Suda, Masami', ['Animation Director']]]
